headline: Simon Property Group Buyback And Board Move Reframe Capital Priorities
summary: Simon Property Group (NYSE:SPG) has authorized a new $2b share repurchase program, replacing a prior buyback plan. The company extended the timeline for repurchases under the new authorization. Simon Property Group appointed Martin J. Cicco, an industry veteran with extensive real estate finance experience, to its Board of Directors. Simon Property Group, one of the largest owners and operators of retail real estate, sits at the intersection of shopping, dining, and mixed use destinations...

headline: Zacks Investment Ideas feature highlights: Alphabet, Amazon, AMD, Nvidia, Simon Property and Teradyne
summary: AMD stumbles post-earnings despite strong growth, while Simon Property and Teradyne shine after Q4 beats that create fresh post-earnings opportunities.

headline: Simon Property Group: The Business Is Solid But It's Now Back To Fair Value
summary: Simon Property Group (SPG) downgraded to neutral near highs as valuation stretches.
